## serialization.exceptions.UnregisteredIcon.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `UnregisteredIcon` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(iconType: string, block: Block, state: State);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  iconType | string | The type of the unregistered icon we are attempting to deserialize. |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) | The block we are attempting to add the unregistered icon to. |
|  state | [State](./blockly.serialization_namespace.blocks_namespace.state_interface.md) | The state object representing the block. |
